resources.string: Connect with our Deaf friends through IBO\'s FSL detector.
Wow! Great Detection. Express your \nFSL and IBO will detect it.
I can do it too. Talk to our Deaf friends \nwith IBO\'s implementation of \nFingerspelling.
TechKnow is a group of like-minded individuals committed to excellence and aims to connect people together through the use of technology.
IBO is an Android application that outputs the detected Filipino Sign Language in real time and displays the corresponding fingerspelling for the text entered.
Open IBO application and select the scan button.
Position the camera at waist level to start the detection. Upon successful detection, the text will be displayed.
To translate into fingerspelling, simply input the text to be translated
Tap the Tutorial button and choose from the 15 words you want to learn the gesture and Filipino translation.
You can also check whether the gestures you have done is correct through the Check the Gesture button.
Care to share more about it??
Your review means a lot to us and we will improve based on this.
This device doesn\'t support Camera2 API.
